00009 public class Teams extends DbObject {
00010 
00011     private static final String[] TABLE_NAME = {"Team"};
00012     private static final String[] ID_FIELDS = {"ID"};
00013     private static final String[] FIELDS = {"ID", "Name"};
00014     
00015     Teams() {
00016         list = new LinkedHashMap<Integer, Data>();
00017         db = new MySqlDb();
00018     }

00020     Teams(int seasonId) {
00021         list = new LinkedHashMap<Integer, Data>();
00022         db = new MySqlDb();
00023         fetch(seasonId);
00024     }
00025 
00026     public void addNew(String name) {
00027         Data team = new Data(name);
00028         list.put(null, team);
00029     }
00030 
00035     public void fetch(int seasonId) {
00036         String[] ids = null;
00037 
00038         if (seasonId != 0) {
00039             ids = new String[1];
00040             ids[0] = String.valueOf(seasonId);
00041         }
00042         
00043         list.clear();
00044 
00045         try {
00046             Statement st = db.con.createStatement();
00047             ResultSet rs = st.executeQuery(db.qe.getItems(TABLE_NAME, FIELDS, ID_FIELDS , ids, null));
00048             while (rs.next()) {
00049                 String id = rs.getString(FIELDS[0]);
00050                 String name = rs.getString(FIELDS[1]);
00051                 Data team = new Data(Integer.parseInt(id.trim()), name);
00052                 list.put(id, team);
00053             }
00054         } catch (Exception e) {
00055             System.err.println("Failed to read team data: " + e.toString());
00056         }
00057 
00058     }
00059 
00063     public class Data extends DbObject.Data {
00064         
00065         Data() {
00066             field_id = null;
00067             field_name = "";
00068         }
00069 
00070         Data (String name) {
00071             field_id = null;
00072             field_name = name;
00073         }
00074         
00075         Data(Integer id, String name) {
00076             field_id = id;
00077             field_name = name;
00078         }
00079     }
